tag_list: resume, developer, big-data, cloud, software-defined-networks, programmable-networks
overview:
Mike Harding is a 25 year veteran of Silicon Valley having founded or co-founded 7 different companies. He has also held executive positions at Sun Microsystems, SAP, Charles Schwab, and Juniper Networks.

Most recently Harding has co-founded the infographic and employment big data start-up, re.vu, with Stephen Years and Bart Clarkson. Harding is the GM/VP for Juniper’s Developer Products and Programs as well advancing the state of the art in software defined networking and programmable networks.
